data.message: Washed up Illuminati puppet. If it wasn’t for Trump, Detroit would be staying the same low life city it’s always been. Too bad you never did nothing to help them. Only reason he’s saying this is cause the people that OWN Eminem don’t like trump cause they can’t buy Donald Trump
